Reviews.Title: Great TV at an affordable price!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I had looked for months at TV's trying to decide which was the best bang for the buck. I finally came across this TV. Sense it was going in a bedroom it didn't have to be huge. I looked at this at walmart and decided that it had the best picture for the money. I decided to check out Amazon and wow what a savings! I saved about $50 bucks and got the same TV! It is awesome! It has great sound and a beautiful, clear picture. I would recommend this TV for anyone who needs a cheap but great quality TV!

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied.
Reviews.Author: The Book Person
Reviews.Content: Bought the 19MF338B TV two weeks ago and am very satisfied with its performance. Am using it with "rabbit ears " and the digital stations are extreemly clear,and most of the set up controls easy to use. The only problem is that I cannot find any instructions on how to program in " favorites ". Other than that, it's a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping-good product
Reviews.Author: J. Wodahl
Reviews.Content: I only received the product yesterday but have these impressions.Amazon delivered promptly.There is a small learning curve in getting the tv up and operating.The picture and sound are great.Local digital and, soon to be gone, analog signals are picked up.The tv works well with Direc TV.The unit was purchased to be the primary tv in our camper - it works well with the onboard antenna and the portable Direc TV dish.The only negative is that it is more technologically advanced than I am.

Reviews.Title: Magnavox Model 19MF338B/F7
Reviews.Author: Brian S. Eisenhour
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and performance for the price. I have two of these and have had no issues with either one.  I would fully recommend this model.  You can spend a lot more and get a lot less!

Reviews.Title: Good value, for the price.
Reviews.Author: waemisc
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for our kitchen and mounted it above countertop. The picture is very good. It has plenty of volume and the sound is good. Very easy and fast set-up. The size is just what I wanted. Nice looking little tv and we use it every day.

Reviews.Title: FABULOUS quality at an affordable price!
Reviews.Author: StyleSmart
Reviews.Content: All prior reviews are spot on - this is a FABULOUS TV at a very affordable price.  I've been using it for several months and the picture & sound quality are EXCELLENT - extremely pleased overall.  The stand is plastic & doesn't tilt or adjust, but no biggie.  Am using it in a small bedroom and the scale is perfect - love the sleek, unassuming footprint.  You can't go wrong with this one - highly, HIGHLY recommend!

Reviews.Title: good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Maren
Reviews.Content: No complaints so far, it is a good lower priced tv, I like the fact that it shows what is playing when you select a channel, you don't have to wait for a commercial to get over or look for a tv guide to see what is on.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and delivery
Reviews.Author: PEL "bargain hunter"
Reviews.Content: Ordered the Magnavox HD TV - best price I could find anywhere for quality and got it just 2 days later.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: HDMI
Reviews.Author: Kickoff169
Reviews.Content: Have had the TV for little over a year now.  Satisfied with the picture and sound, but disappointed in the HDMI connection.  It has stopped working so can not get HD TV now.

Reviews.Title: Magnavox hdtv
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Clarkston
Reviews.Content: This a nice product, easy to set up and a good picture with a hdtv rabbit ear amplified antnna, it recieves all the channels in the area. Only use a clean cotten cloth to clean the screen, I called Magnavox about that.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Epiphany
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv and it is great.  Of course I have satellite cable.  The picture and sound is great.  No complaints.  I highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Highlife
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery, great picture & I use it for my computer monitor also. Can't beat the price of $149 for a quality TV. Some reviews wrote that the standard base doesn't tilt? Yes it does, when assembling TV into the base make sure you snap it into place all the way down then it tilts about 10 degrees upward.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: J. Elker "zero_haze"
Reviews.Content: Bought this refurbished here on Amazon for a remarkably low price.  I am very happy - great pic and sound quality for its size.  So far so good!

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Carmen Ramirez "Carmen Y. Ramirez"
Reviews.Content: I added the light weight attribute because I'm an 8 month pregnant woman and it is important that I do not move or lift heavy things, and it was really light, I was surprised.At first I was so frustrated because I didn't understand the digital TV thing, I thought a Digital TV had everything needed to get the channels... But after I learned that I needed to attach an antenna and got it, I'm actually very happy with the TV. Great Picture, sound, many features... The reviews were right.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for college
Reviews.Author: Samuel Clemens "Example: Sam"
Reviews.Content: I've been away at college since last august and for my birthday, my parents got me this to use in my dorm. The quality is great and the size is just perfect for my room. I even use it as an extra monitor for my laptop mostly for watching movies and shows I missed on TV because of this one class of mine.The only thing that it's missing is some manner of output for audio (either mini stereo or component output connectors would be nice). It's not really necessary, but it would be nice (I've got a pair of nice bookshelf stereo speakers I'd like to use if I could)

ProductInfo.Features:
High-definition 19-inch LCD WXGA+ display, 1440 x 900
Integrated tuner decodes digital ATSC and QAM signals
Dynamic Contrast gives enriched color performance
Dolby Digital for movies and concerts in full surround sound
HDMI for full digital High Definition connection
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 19MF338B/F7 19-Inch LCD HDTV
